channel.title: Client freezing, playing up
channel.description:
Hello,
I've never really had any problems with clients before so I'll try and explain this as well as possible. Basically, people have been freezing in all areas (somewhat randomly) and some even disconnecting. I believe the client is based of Boxingscape which I believe to be Bluur.
I personally don't experience such crashes but others do. They say there is no error in the cmd. This makes it harder to locate.
Any help/information is widely accepted and thanked.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Client freezing, playing up
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Hello,

I’ve never really had any problems with clients before so I’ll try and explain this as well as possible. Basically, people have been freezing in all areas (somewhat randomly) and some even disconnecting. I believe the client is based of Boxingscape which I believe to be Bluur.

I personally don’t experience such crashes but others do. They say there is no error in the cmd. This makes it harder to locate.

Any help/information is widely accepted and thanked.

Thanks in advance.
